## About myself

I am a young mexican scientist discovering her path in science and a bioinformatician in training. I'm an incoming PhD student at [CSHL](https://www.cshl.edu/phd-program/), and I am currently working with bulk and snRNA-seq data from lateral septum and habenula at [LIBD](https://www.libd.org/). I'm also training for a half-marathon and enjoying eating accordingly.
